title: Snatch this M3 iMac deal and save $200 on Apple’s gorgeous all-in-one
content:
Macworld

The new iMac is down to its best price again, making it the perfect time to grab one of the coolest desktops you could ever own. Now available for $1,100 at Amazon, a $200 discount and the best price we’ve seen so far.

The 2023 iMac is the complete setup, featuring a computer, display, and even peripherals, which means you won’t have to shell out any more money. We reviewed the iMac M3 and were rather impressed by it, giving this new computer a 4.5/5 star rating and our Editors’ Choice award. Our expert appreciated the CPU and GPU performance, the thin design, and the great image quality.

“If you’re looking for a new, complete Mac setup– a computer, display, and input devices–the M3 iMac is a great choice. Apple makes the setup so darn easy and smooth, the iMac looks good on a desk, and the new M3 chip is speedy and solid for everyday use,” our review noted.

The 24-inch 4.5K Retina Display is absolutely gorgeous and will display crisp and clear images. Even better, it has 500 nits of brightness, so you’ll be able to see clearly in all lighting conditions. The iMac also includes built-in speakers, a three-mic array, and a 1080p camera that will keep the focus on you in all of your Zoom meetings.

So go ahead and snatch the new iMac for $1,100 at Amazon in a rare chance to save a bundle while getting one of the best desktops you possibly can.
